***омрачить.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:омрачить.html>омрачи́ть</a> (19477)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D0%BC%D1%80%D0%B0%D1%87%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">о-</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">o-</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:мрачный.html>мра́чный</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">mráčnyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ить</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-ítʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, or perhaps from <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">о-</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">o-</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">мрачить</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">mračítʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D0%BC%D1%80%D0%B0%D1%87%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:омрачить.html>омрачи́ть</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">omračítʹ</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="perfective aspect">pf</abbr></span> (<i>imperfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:омрачать.html>омрача́ть</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">dated</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> to darken, to cloud</li>
<li>to darken, to cloud, to overshadow</li></ol>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D0%BC%D1%80%D0%B0%D1%87%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:омрачить.html>омрачи́ть</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>Глаго́л</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:совершить.html>совершенный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>вид</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:переходный.html>перехо́дный</a>,    <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> спряжения <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | Зализняка | — | 4b.      <a href = vnd.unilang:соответствующий.html>Соотве́тствующий</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>глаго́л</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:несовершенный.html>несоверше́нного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>ви́да</a> | — | <a href = vnd.unilang:омрачать.html>омрача́ть</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:приставка.html>Приста́вка</a>: <b>о-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>ко́рень</a>: <b>-мрач-</b>; суффикс: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:соорудить.html>-и</a></b>; глагольное <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ть</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

***омут.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:омут.html>о́мут</a> (13552)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D0%BC%D1%83%D1%82amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><span class="maintenance-line" style="color: 777777;">(This etymology is missing or incomplete. Please add to it, or discuss it at the Etymology scriptorium.)</span>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D0%BC%D1%83%D1%82amp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:омут.html>о́мут</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">ómut</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> | <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i>genitive</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:омут.html>о́мута</a></b>, <i>nominative plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:омут.html>о́муты</a></b> <i>or</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:омут.html>о́мута</a></b>, <i>genitive plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:омут.html>о́мутов</a></b> <i>or</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:омут.html>о́мутов</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><i>(underwater)</i> pool, slough
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:тихий.html>ти́хом</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:омут.html>о́муте</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:чертить.html>черти́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:водиться.html>во́дятся</a></i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">v tíxom ómute čerti vódjatsja</i> ― <span class="e-translation">still waters run deep</span></div></dd></dl></li>
<li>whirlpool</li>
<li>slough
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%82%D0%BE%D0%BB%D0%BA%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8C_%D0%B2_%D0%BE%D0%BC%D1%83%D1%82amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:толкать.html>толка́ть</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:омут.html>о́мут</a> (page does not exist)"><a href = vnd.unilang:толкать.html>толка́ть</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:омут.html>о́мут</a></a></i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">tolkátʹ v ómut</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href="/w/index.php?title=urge_on_to_one%27s_destructionamp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="urge on to one | s destruction (page does not exist)">urge on to one's destruction</a></span></div></dd></dl></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D0%BC%D1%83%D1%82amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:о.html>о</a><span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">·</span>мут</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:мужской.html>мужско́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ние</a> | (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 1a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-омут-</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

<h4><span id=".D0.A1.D0.B8.D0.BD.D0.BE.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.BC.D1.8B"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="<a href = vnd.unilang:синоним.html>Сино́нимы</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:синоним.html>Сино́нимы</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D0%BC%D1%83%D1%82amp;action=editamp;section=6" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:синоним.html>Сино́нимы</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>

***омывать.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:омывать.html>омыва́ть</a> (20415)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D0%BC%D1%8B%D0%B2%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:омыть.html>омы́ть</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">omýtʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-вать</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-vátʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D0%BC%D1%8B%D0%B2%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:омывать.html>омыва́ть</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">omyvátʹ</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="imperfective aspect">impf</abbr></span> (<i>perfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:омыть.html>омы́ть</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">literary<span class="ib-comma">,</span> | also |  | impersonal</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> to wash
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дождь.html>дождь</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:омыть.html>омы́л</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:улица.html>у́лицы</a></i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">doždʹ <b>omýl</b> úlicy</i> ― <span class="e-translation">the rain <b>washed</b> the streets</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:улица.html>у́лицы</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:омыть.html>омы́ло</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:дождь.html>дождём</a></i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">úlicy <b>omýlo</b> doždjóm</i> ― <span class="e-translation">the streets <b>were washed</b> by the rain</span></div></dd></dl></li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">imperfective only</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> to pour over from all sides, to lap <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">of water</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span></li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">imperfective only</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> to surround with its water <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">of the sea or ocean</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms">Related terms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D0%BC%D1%8B%D0%B2%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=7" title="Edit section: Related terms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>

<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:мыть.html>мыть</a></span> | <span class="gender"><abbr title="imperfective aspect">impf</abbr></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">mytʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:помыть.html>помы́ть</a></span> | <span class="gender"><abbr title="perfective aspect">pf</abbr></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">pomýtʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:вымыть.html>вы́мыть</a></span> | <span class="gender"><abbr title="perfective aspect">pf</abbr></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">výmytʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D0%BC%D1%8B%D0%B2%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:омыть.html>омы́ть</a> (23977)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D0%BC%D1%8B%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">о-</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">o-</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:мыть.html>мыть</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">mytʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D0%BC%D1%8B%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:омыть.html>омы́ть</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">omýtʹ</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="perfective aspect">pf</abbr></span> (<i>imperfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:омывать.html>омыва́ть</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">literary<span class="ib-comma">,</span> | also |  | impersonal</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> to wash
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дождь.html>дождь</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:омыть.html>омы́л</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:улица.html>у́лицы</a></i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">doždʹ <b>omýl</b> úlicy</i> ― <span class="e-translation">the rain <b>washed</b> the streets</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:улица.html>у́лицы</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:омыть.html>омы́ло</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:дождь.html>дождём</a></i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">úlicy <b>omýlo</b> doždjóm</i> ― <span class="e-translation">the streets <b>were washed</b> by the rain</span></div></dd></dl></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms">Related terms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D0%BC%D1%8B%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=7" title="Edit section: Related terms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:мыть.html>мыть</a></span> | <span class="gender"><abbr title="imperfective aspect">impf</abbr></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">mytʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:помыть.html>помы́ть</a></span> | <span class="gender"><abbr title="perfective aspect">pf</abbr></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">pomýtʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:вымыть.html>вы́мыть</a></span> | <span class="gender"><abbr title="perfective aspect">pf</abbr></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">výmytʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:мыться.html>мы́ться</a></span> | <span class="gender"><abbr title="imperfective aspect">impf</abbr></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">mýtʹsja</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:помыться.html>помы́ться</a></span> | <span class="gender"><abbr title="perfective aspect">pf</abbr></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">pomýtʹsja</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B2%D1%8B%D0%BC%D1%8B%D1%82%D1%8C%D1%81%D1%8Famp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="вымыться (page does not exist)">вымыться</a></span> | <span class="gender"><abbr title="perfective aspect">pf</abbr></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">výmytʹsja</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:мытье.html>мытьё</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">mytʹjó</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:мойка.html>мо́йка</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">mójka</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">мойщик</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">mójščik</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:мыть.html>мо́ющий</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">mójuščij</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:мыло.html>мы́ло</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">mýlo</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D0%BC%D1%8B%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:о.html>о</a><span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">·</span><a href = vnd.unilang:мыть.html>мыть</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>Глаго́л</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:совершить.html>совершенный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>вид</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:переходный.html>перехо́дный</a>,    <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> спряжения <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | Зализняка | — | 12a.      <a href = vnd.unilang:соответствующий.html>Соотве́тствующий</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>глаго́л</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:несовершенный.html>несоверше́нного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>ви́да</a> | — | <a href = vnd.unilang:омывать.html>омыва́ть</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:приставка.html>Приста́вка</a>: <b>о-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>ко́рень</a>: <b>-мы-</b>; глагольное <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ть</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>
<h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="<a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D0%BC%D1%8B%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=5" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:вымыть.html>вы́мыть</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:со.html>со</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:весь.html>все́х</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:сторона.html>сторо́н</a> <span class="example-fullblock"> |  | <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>Не</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:они.html>их</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ли.html>ли</a> кровию <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; font-weight: bold;">омыты</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:твой.html>твои́</a> булатные <a href = vnd.unilang:копыто.html>копы́та</a>? <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%9F%D1%83%D1%88%D0%BA%D0%B8%D0%BD,_%D0%90%D0%BB%D0%B5%D0%BA%D1%81%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B4%D1%80_%D0%A1%D0%B5%D1%80%D0%B3%D0%B5%D0%B5%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%87" class="extiw" title="w:Пушкин, Александр Сергеевич"><a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | <a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>С</a>. | Пушкин</a><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span> <span class="example-fullblock"> |  | <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:сын.html>Сын</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пред.html>пред</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:отец.html>отцо́м</a> преклонился, <a href = vnd.unilang:нога.html>ноги</a> <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:омыть.html>омы́л</a></span> <a href = vnd.unilang:старик.html>ста́рику</a>. <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%9D%D0%B5%D0%BA%D1%80%D0%B0%D1%81%D0%BE%D0%B2,_%D0%9D%D0%B8%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%BB%D0%B0%D0%B9_%D0%90%D0%BB%D0%B5%D0%BA%D1%81%D0%B5%D0%B5%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%87" class="extiw" title="w:Некрасов, Николай Алексеевич">Н. | <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | Некрасов</a><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>

<h4><span id=".D0.A1.D0.B8.D0.BD.D0.BE.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.BC.D1.8B"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="<a href = vnd.unilang:синоним.html>Сино́нимы</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:синоним.html>Сино́нимы</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D0%BC%D1%8B%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=6" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:синоним.html>Сино́нимы</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>

</body>
***он.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>он</a> (2)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_4">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D0%BDamp;action=editamp;section=32" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Old_East_Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Old East Slavic">Old East Slavic</a></span> <i class="Cyrs mention" lang="orv">онъ</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Orv-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">onŭ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Proto-Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Slavic">Proto-Slavic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="sla-pro">*onъ</i>.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronoun">Pronoun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D0%BDamp;action=editamp;section=34" title="Edit section: Pronoun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>он</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">on</span>) (<i>feminine</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:она.html>она</a></b>, <i>neuter</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:оно.html>оно</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>third-person masculine singular pronoun: he, it.</li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Usage_notes">Usage notes</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D0%BDamp;action=editamp;section=35" title="Edit section: Usage notes">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Whenever a preposition stands immediately before any of the oblique cases of the third-person pronoun (singular or plural) and directly governs it, then an <b>н</b>- must be prefixed to the pronoun: <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:от.html>от</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>него́</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">ot nevó</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> <i>(from him)</i>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>нём</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">na njóm</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> <i>(on him)</i>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:у.html>у</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>него́</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">u nevó</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> <i>(he has)</i>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:к.html>к</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>нему́</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">k nemú</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> <i>(to him)</i>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>с</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>ним</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">s nim</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> <i>(with him)</i>.</li>
<li>The explanation for the <b>н</b>-prothesis is that, originally, some Russian prepositions ended in the letter -<b>н</b>: <b>сън</b> (sŭn, <i>“with”</i>...cf. Greek <b><i class="None mention" lang="ru">σύν</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">σύν</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></b>, Latin <b><span class="Latn" lang="la">cum</span></b>). Eventually, the final <b>н</b> of these prepositions migrated across to the pronoun, so that <b>сън <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>им</a></b> became modern <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>с</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>ним</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">s nim</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, and then this was extended to include <i>all</i> prepositions when governing any third-person pronoun.</li>
<li>Note that if the preposition does <b>not</b> directly govern <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>его́</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">jevó</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> (i.e., when <b><a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>его́</a></b> is a possessive pronoun), then <b>н</b>- is not prefixed: <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:у.html>у</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>его́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:брат.html>бра́та</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">u jevó bráta</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> <i>(at his brother’s)</i>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:о.html>о</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>его́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:мать.html>матери</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">o jevó máteri</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> <i>(about his mother)</i>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>его́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:комната.html>ко́мнате</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">v jevó kómnate</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> <i>(in his room)</i>.</li>
<li>When there is another word separating a preposition and any oblique case of <b><a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>он</a></b>, the <b>н-</b> is not added: <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:у.html>у</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:самый.html>самого</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>его́</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">u samovó jevó</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> <i>(with him himself)</i>.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms">Related terms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D0%BDamp;action=editamp;section=37" title="Edit section: Related terms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>его́</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">jevó</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:свое.html>свой</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">svoj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<hr />
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>он</a></b>
</p><p>Местоимение, <a href = vnd.unilang:личный.html>ли́чное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:третий.html>тре́тьего</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:лицо.html>лица</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:единственный.html>еди́нственного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:число.html>числа</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:мужской.html>мужско́го</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>рода</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:форма.html>Фо́рмы</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:косвенный.html>ко́свенных</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:падеж.html>падеже́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>с</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:начальный.html>нача́льным</a> <i>н</i> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребляться.html>употребля́ются</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:сочетание.html>сочета́нии</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>с</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:предлог.html>предло́гами</a>; <a href = vnd.unilang:форма.html>фо́рма</a> <i><a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>него́</a></i> <a href = vnd.unilang:мочь.html>мо́жет</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребляться.html>употребля́ться</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:после.html>после</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:сравнительный.html>сравни́тельной</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:степень.html>сте́пени</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:также.html>Та́кже</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> предложном <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> творительном <a href = vnd.unilang:падеж.html>падежа́х</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:использоваться.html>испо́льзуется</a> | ,  <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a>  <a href = vnd.unilang:вариант.html>вариа́нт</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a>: <i><a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%91%D0%BCamp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="ём (<a href = vnd.unilang:страница.html>страни́ца</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:существовать.html>существу́ет</a>)">ём</a></i>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> <a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%91%D0%BCamp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="ём (<a href = vnd.unilang:страница.html>страни́ца</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:существовать.html>существу́ет</a>)">ём</a></i>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:за.html>за</a> <a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%91%D0%BCamp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="ём (<a href = vnd.unilang:страница.html>страни́ца</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:существовать.html>существу́ет</a>)">ём</a></i>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-он-</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.

***она.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:она.html>она</a> (13)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_2">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%B0amp;action=editamp;section=8" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Proto-Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Slavic">Proto-Slavic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="sla-pro">*ona</i>.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronoun_3">Pronoun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%B0amp;action=editamp;section=10" title="Edit section: Pronoun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:она.html>она</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">oná</span>) (<i>masculine counterpart</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>он</a></b>, <i>neuter counterpart</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:оно.html>оно</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>she, it <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">third-person feminine singular pronoun</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:да.html>Да</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:как.html>как</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:же.html>же</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:она.html>она</a></b>, <a href = vnd.unilang:так.html>так</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:говорить.html>говори́т</a>?</i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">Da kak že <b>oná</b>, tak i govorít?</i> ― <span class="e-translation">What is she like? Does she talk?</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:она.html>Её</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:нет.html>нет</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:дом.html>дома</a></i> <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">genitive</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>Jejó</b> net dóma</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><i>She’s not home.</i></span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:она.html>Ей</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:спаться.html>спи́тся</a>.</i> <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">dative</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>Jej</b> ne spítsja.</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><i>She is unable to sleep.</i></span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:я.html>Я</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:видеть.html>ви́жу</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:она.html>её</a></b>.</i> <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">accusative</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">Ja vížu <b>jejó</b>.</i> ― <span class="e-translation">I see her.</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:за.html>За</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:она.html>не́ю</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:пять.html>пять</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:рубль.html>рубле́й</a>.</i> <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">instrumental</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">Za <b>néju</b> pjatʹ rubléj.</i> ― <span class="e-translation">She owes five rubles.</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>Он</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:это.html>э́то</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:при.html>при</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:она.html>ней</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:сказать.html>сказа́л</a>.</i> <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">prepositional</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">On éto pri <b>nej</b> skazál.</i> ― <span class="e-translation">He said it in her presence.</span></div></dd></dl></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Usage_notes">Usage notes</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%B0amp;action=editamp;section=11" title="Edit section: Usage notes">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Whenever a preposition stands immediately before any of the oblique cases of the third-person pronoun (singular or plural) and directly governs it, then an <b>н</b>- is prefixed to the pronoun: <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:от.html>от</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:она.html>неё</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">ot nejó</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">from her</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:она.html>ней</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">na nej</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">on her</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:у.html>у</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:она.html>неё</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">u nejó</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">she has</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:к.html>к</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:она.html>ней</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">k nej</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">to her</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>с</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:она.html>не́ю</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">s néju</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">with her</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.</li>
<li>The explanation for the <b>н</b>-prothesis is that, originally, some Russian prepositions ended in the letter -<b>н</b>: <b>сън</b> (sŭn, <i>“with”</i>...cf. Greek <b><i class="None mention" lang="ru">σύν</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">σύν</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></b>, Latin <b><i class="Latn mention" lang="la">cum</i></b>). Eventually, the final <b>н</b> of these prepositions migrated across to the pronoun, so that <b>вън <a href = vnd.unilang:она.html>её</a></b> became modern <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:она.html>неё</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">v nejó</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, and then this was extended to include <i>all</i> prepositions when governing any third-person pronoun.</li>
<li>Note that if the preposition does <b>not</b> directly govern <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:она.html>её</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">jejó</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> (i.e., when <b><a href = vnd.unilang:она.html>её</a></b> is a possessive pronoun), then the <b>н</b>- is not inserted: <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:у.html>у</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:она.html>её</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:брат.html>бра́та</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">u jejó bráta</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">at her brother’s</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:о.html>о</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:она.html>её</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:мать.html>матери</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">o jejó máteri</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">about her mother</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:она.html>её</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:комната.html>ко́мнате</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">v jejó kómnate</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">in her room</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.</li>
<li>When there is another word separating a preposition and any oblique case of <b><a href = vnd.unilang:она.html>она</a></b>, the <b>н-</b> is not added: <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:у.html>у</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:самый.html>самой</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:она.html>её</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">u samój jejó</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">with her herself</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms">Related terms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%B0amp;action=editamp;section=13" title="Edit section: Related terms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:она.html>её</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">jejó</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:свое.html>свой</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">svoj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<hr />
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:о.html>о</a><span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">·</span><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a></b>
</p><p>Местоимение, <a href = vnd.unilang:личный.html>ли́чное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:третий.html>тре́тьего</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:лицо.html>лица</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:единственный.html>еди́нственного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:число.html>числа</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:женский.html>же́нского</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>рода</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:образовать.html>Образу́ет</a> омоформу <i><a href = vnd.unilang:она.html>её</a></i> <a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>с</a> притяжательным местоимением <a href = vnd.unilang:женский.html>же́нского</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>рода</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:третий.html>тре́тьего</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:лицо.html>лица</a>.
</p>
<dl><dt><a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>Употребле́ние</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:форма.html>фо́рм</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> <i>н-</i></dt></dl>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>В</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:литературный.html>литерату́рном</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:язык.html>языке́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:этот.html>э́ти</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:форма.html>фо́рмы</a>:
</p>
<ul><li><a href = vnd.unilang:обязательный.html>обяза́тельны</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:непосредственно.html>непосре́дственно</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:после.html>после</a> первообразных <a href = vnd.unilang:предлог.html>предло́гов</a>: <i><a href = vnd.unilang:от.html>от</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:она.html>неё</a></i>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:при.html>при</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:она.html>ней</a></i>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>с</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:она.html>не́ю</a></i> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> | т. | д.;</li>
<li><a href = vnd.unilang:возможный.html>возмо́жны</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:после.html>после</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:производный.html>произво́дных</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:предлог.html>предло́гов</a>: <i><a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:течение.html>тече́ние</a> её/неё</i>;</li>
<li><a href = vnd.unilang:возможный.html>возмо́жны</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:тот.html>те́х</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:случай.html>слу́чаях</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:когда.html>когда́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:между.html>ме́жду</a> первообразным <a href = vnd.unilang:предлог.html>предло́гом</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> местоимением <a href = vnd.unilang:стоять.html>стоят</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:другой.html>други́е</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:слово.html>слова</a>: <i><a href = vnd.unilang:к.html>к</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:один.html>одно́й</a> ей/ней</i>;</li>
<li><a href = vnd.unilang:возможный.html>возмо́жны</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:после.html>после</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:некоторый.html>не́которых</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:форма.html>фо́рм</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:сравнительный.html>сравни́тельной</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:степень.html>сте́пени</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:прилагательное.html>прилага́тельных</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:наречие.html>наре́чий</a>: <i>лучше её/неё</i>.</li></ul>
<dl><dt><a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>Употребле́ние</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:форма.html>фо́рм</a> <i><a href = vnd.unilang:она.html>ея</a></i> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:она.html>нея́</a></i>) <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <i>оне</i></dt></dl>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>В</a> дореформенной орфографии <a href = vnd.unilang:различаться.html>различа́лось</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:написание.html>написа́ние</a> родительного <a href = vnd.unilang:падеж.html>падежа́</a> <i>ея/<a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B5%D1%8Famp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:она.html>нея́</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> винительного <i>её/неё</i>, <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>а</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:также.html>та́кже</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:написание.html>написа́ние</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:форма.html>фо́рм</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:множественный.html>мно́жественного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:число.html>числа</a> <i><a href = vnd.unilang:они.html>они</a></i> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <i><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D0%BD%D1%A3amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="онѣ (<a href = vnd.unilang:страница.html>страни́ца</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:существовать.html>существу́ет</a>)">онѣ</a></i> (<a href = vnd.unilang:последний.html>после́дняя</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:или.html>или</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:объект.html>объе́ктов</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:женский.html>же́нского</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>рода</a>). <a href = vnd.unilang:однако.html>Одна́ко</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:литературный.html>литерату́рном</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:произношение.html>произноше́нии</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:данный.html>да́нное</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:различие.html>разли́чие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:практически.html>практи́чески</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:никогда.html>никогда́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:отражаться.html>отража́лось</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:поэтому.html>поэ́тому</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:новый.html>но́вой</a> орфографии <a href = vnd.unilang:почти.html>почти́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:всегда.html>всегда́</a> <i>ея/<a vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:существовать.html>существу́ет</a>)"><a href = vnd.unilang:она.html>нея́</a></a> → её/неё</i> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <i><a ***онанизм.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:онанизм.html>онани́зм</a> (25043)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%B7%D0%BCamp;action=editamp;section=3" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:онанизм.html>онани́зм</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">onanízm</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> | <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i>genitive</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:онанизм.html>онани́зма</a></b>, <i>nominative plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:онанизм.html>онани́змы</a></b>, <i>genitive plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:онанизм.html>онани́змов</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>onanism</li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span></h3>
<p><b>о·на<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>низм</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:мужской.html>мужско́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ние</a> | (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 1a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-онан-</b>; суффикс: <b>-изм</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

***онеметь.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:онеметь.html>онеметь</a> (10420)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%B5%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">о-</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">o-</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:неметь.html>неме́ть</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">nemétʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%B5%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:онеметь.html>онеметь</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">onemétʹ</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="perfective aspect">pf</abbr></span> (<i>imperfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:неметь.html>неме́ть</a></b> <i>or</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%B5%D0%BC%D0%B5%D0%B2%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="онемевать (page does not exist)">онемевать</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>to become dumb, to mute</li>
<li>to become numb</li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms">Related terms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%B5%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=7" title="Edit section: Related terms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:немой.html>немой</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">nemój</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:немота.html>немота́</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">nemotá</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%B5%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:о.html>о</a><span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">·</span><a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:метить.html>ме́ть</a></b> | (<span title="<a href = vnd.unilang:написание.html>написа́ние</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> дореформенной орфографии" style="border-bottom: 1px dotted; cursor: help">дореформ.</span> <span style="font-family: | Palatino Linotype | "><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D0%BD%D1%A3%D0%BC%D1%A3%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="онѣмѣть (<a href = vnd.unilang:страница.html>страни́ца</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:существовать.html>существу́ет</a>)">онѣмѣть</a></span>)
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>Глаго́л</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:совершить.html>совершенный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>вид</a>, непереходный,    <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> спряжения <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | Зализняка | — | 1a.      <a href = vnd.unilang:соответствующий.html>Соотве́тствующие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>глаго́лы</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:несовершенный.html>несоверше́нного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>ви́да</a> | — | <a href = vnd.unilang:неметь.html>неме́ть</a>, онемевать.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:приставка.html>Приста́вка</a>: <b>о-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>ко́рень</a>: <b>-нем-</b>; суффикс: <b>-е</b>; глагольное <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ть</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

<li> <a href = vnd.unilang:оцепенеть.html>оцепене́ть</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:утратить.html>утра́тить</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:чувствительность.html>чувстви́тельность</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:гибкость.html>ги́бкость</a> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:о.html>о</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:член.html>чле́нах</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:тело.html>тела</a></i>) <span class="example-fullblock"> |  | <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:неловко.html>Нело́вко</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:рука.html>рука́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:затечь.html>затекла́</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:локоть.html>ло́коть</a> <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:онеметь.html>онеме́л</a></span>, <a href = vnd.unilang:но.html>но</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:я.html>я</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:весь.html>всё</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:так.html>так</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:же.html>же</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:напряженный.html>напряженно</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:неподвижный.html>неподви́жен</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:весь.html>всё</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:так.html>так</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:же.html>же</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:шевелиться.html>шевелю́сь</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:удерживать.html>уде́рживая</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:дыхание.html>дыха́ние</a>. <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%A1%D0%B5%D1%80%D0%B0%D1%84%D0%B8%D0%BC%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%87,_%D0%90%D0%BB%D0%B5%D0%BA%D1%81%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B4%D1%80_%D0%A1%D0%B5%D1%80%D0%B0%D1%84%D0%B8%D0%BC%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%87" class="extiw" title="w:Серафимович, Александр Серафимович"><a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | <a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>С</a>. | Серафимович</a>, «<a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>В</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:номер.html>но́мере</a>», <span class="example-date">1910</span> | г.<span class="citation-source"> <span class="nkrja-source" style="font-size: x-small; font-style: italic;">(<a href = vnd.unilang:цитата.html>цита́та</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:из.html>из</a> <a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%9D%D0%B0%D1%86%D0%B8%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%BB%D1%8C%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9_%D0%BA%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%BF%D1%83%D1%81_%D1%80%D1%83%D1%81%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B3%D0%BE_%D1%8F%D0%B7%D1%8B%D0%BA%D0%B0" class="extiw" title="w:<a href = vnd.unilang:национальный.html>Национа́льный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:корпус.html>ко́рпус</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:русский.html>ру́сского</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:язык.html>языка́</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:национальный.html>Национа́льного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:корпус.html>корпуса</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:русский.html>ру́сского</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:язык.html>языка́</a></a>, см. <a href = vnd.unilang:список.html>Спи́сок</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:литература.html>литерату́ры</a>)</span></span></i></span></span></span></li>
</ol>
<h4><span id=".D0.A1.D0.B8.D0.BD.D0.BE.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.BC.D1.8B"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="<a href = vnd.unilang:синоним.html>Сино́нимы</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:синоним.html>Сино́нимы</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%B5%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=6" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:синоним.html>Сино́нимы</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>

</ol>
</body>
***они.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:они.html>они</a> (16)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%B8amp;action=editamp;section=3" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Old_East_Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Old East Slavic">Old East Slavic</a></span> <i class="Cyrs mention" lang="orv"><a href = vnd.unilang:они.html>они</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Orv-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">oni</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Proto-Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Slavic">Proto-Slavic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="sla-pro">*onъ</i>.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronoun">Pronoun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%B8amp;action=editamp;section=5" title="Edit section: Pronoun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:они.html>они</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">oní</span>)
</p>
<ol><li>they <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">third-person plural pronoun</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Usage_notes">Usage notes</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%B8amp;action=editamp;section=6" title="Edit section: Usage notes">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>An <b>н</b> is prefixed to any third-person pronoun in an oblique case whenever a preposition that directly governs it is immediately in front of it: <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:от.html>от</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:она.html>неё</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">ot nejó</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> <i>(from her)</i>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>нём</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">na njóm</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> <i>(on him)</i>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:у.html>у</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:они.html>них</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">u nix</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> <i>(they have)</i>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:к.html>к</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>нему́</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">k nemú</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> <i>(to him)</i>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>с</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:она.html>не́ю</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">s néju</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> <i>(with her)</i>.</li>
<li>This comes from Russian prepositions such as <b>сън</b> (sŭn, "with", cf. Greek <b><i class="None mention" lang="ru">σύν</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">σύν</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></b>, Latin <b><span class="Latn" lang="la">cum</span></b>), that originally ended in -<b>н</b> and governed oblique cases. Since the prepositions and the pronouns occurred together so often, it was easy to lose track of which word the final -<b>н</b> belonged to, and the <b>н</b> was reinterpreted as part of the pronouns (Old English <i class="Latinx mention" lang="ang">an</i>, in the same way, lost its -n except before vowels, and sometimes gave it to the following word, as in English <i class="Latn mention" lang="en">adder</i> from Old English <i class="Latinx mention" lang="ang">nædre</i>), so that <b>сън <a href = vnd.unilang:они.html>и́ми</a></b> became modern <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>с</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:они.html>ни́ми</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">s ními</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, and this new rule was extended to <i>all</i> prepositions governing any third-person pronoun.</li>
<li>That if the preposition does <b>not</b> directly govern <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>его́</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:она.html>её</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:они.html>их</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">jevó, jejó, ix</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> (i.e., when they are possessive pronouns), then no <b>н</b>- is inserted: <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:у.html>у</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>его́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:брат.html>бра́та</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">u jevó bráta</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> <i>(at his brother’s)</i>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:о.html>о</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:она.html>её</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:мать.html>матери</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">o jejó máteri</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> <i>(about her mother)</i>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:они.html>их</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:комната.html>ко́мнате</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">v ix kómnate</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> <i>(in their room)</i>.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms">Related terms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%B8amp;action=editamp;section=8" title="Edit section: Related terms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:свое.html>свой</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">svoj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<hr />
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:о.html>о</a><span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">·</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ни.html>ни</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:множественный.html>Мно́жественное</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:число.html>число́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:третий.html>тре́тьего</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:лицо.html>лица</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:личный.html>ли́чного</a> местоимения.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:форма.html>Фо́рмы</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:косвенный.html>ко́свенных</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:падеж.html>падеже́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>с</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:начальный.html>нача́льным</a> <i>н</i> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребляться.html>употребля́ются</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:сочетание.html>сочета́нии</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>с</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:предлог.html>предло́гами</a>; <a href = vnd.unilang:форма.html>фо́рма</a> <i><a href = vnd.unilang:они.html>них</a></i> <a href = vnd.unilang:мочь.html>мо́жет</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребляться.html>употребля́ться</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:после.html>после</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:сравнительный.html>сравни́тельной</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:степень.html>сте́пени</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:образовать.html>Образу́ет</a> омоформу <i><a href = vnd.unilang:они.html>их</a></i> <a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>с</a> притяжательным местоимением <a href = vnd.unilang:третий.html>тре́тьего</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:лицо.html>лица</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:множественный.html>мно́жественного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:число.html>числа</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>В</a> дательном <a href = vnd.unilang:падеж.html>падеже́</a> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>им</a></i>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>ним</a></i>) омонимично творительному <a href = vnd.unilang:падеж.html>падежу́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:личный.html>ли́чного</a> местоимения <a href = vnd.unilang:мужской.html>мужско́го</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:средний.html>сре́днего</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>рода</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:третий.html>тре́тьем</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:лицо.html>лице́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:единственный.html>еди́нственного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:число.html>числа</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-он-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:соорудить.html>-и</a></b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>
<h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="<a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>
